about.details:
Founded in 2017, Blue Pebble Limited provides interior design and environmental branding solutions.

The company provides conceptualization, design, printing, furnishing and installation of vinyl graphics, signage, and various furnishing products, including but not limited to 3D walls, frost/clear glass films, artefacts, wall panels, murals and sculptures for corporate interiors and external workplace environments. The company's printing and design services include themed designs, large format printing, vinyl printing, fabric printing, canvas printing, signage fabrication and 3D art installation.

The company's clients include companies from the banking sector, MNCs and IT sectors, including Infosys Limited, HDFC Bank Limited, American Express, Bank of America, Nestle, British Petroleum, Moody's, etc. The company is headquartered in Mumbai and has a presence in Delhi, Maharashtra, Gujarat, Utter Pradesh, Telangana, Odisha, Madhya Pradesh, Punjab, Tamilnadu, etc.

Blue Pebble won an architecture and interior design award presented by Beginup Research Intelligence Pvt Ltd. in 2022. It was awarded "Most Creative & Innovative Design Agency" by Design Awards India in 2022 and "India's Best Design Studio" by IBDA in 2023.

As of September 30, 2023, Blue Pebble has 34 full-time employees in various departments.

faqs.question: What is the Blue Pebble IPO?
faqs.answer:
Blue Pebble IPO is a SME IPO of 1080000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹18.14 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹168 per share. The minimum order quantity is 800.

The IPO opens on March 26, 2024, and closes on March 28, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Blue Pebble IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Blue Pebble IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Blue Pebble IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Blue Pebble IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Blue Pebble IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Blue Pebble IPO?
faqs.answer: Blue Pebble IPO lot size is 800, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,34,400.

faqs.question: How to apply for Blue Pebble IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Blue Pebble IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Blue Pebble IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Blue Pebble IPO will be done on Monday, April 1, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, April 2, 2024. Check the Blue Pebble IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Blue Pebble IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Blue Pebble IPO listing date is on Wednesday, April 3, 2024.
